visual.style: Premium minimalist tech — Apple-inspired clean aesthetic. White space is intentional. Every element earns its place.
visual.mood: Confident, aspirational, human-first technology. Not cold/sterile — warm and inviting despite being tech.
visual.lighting: Soft directional lighting with subtle gradient backgrounds. Product shots use rim lighting for depth. Lifestyle shots use warm natural light.
visual.backgrounds: Clean gradient backgrounds: deep navy (#0a1628) to soft charcoal (#1a1a2e) for dark mode, off-white (#f8f9fa) to warm gray (#e8e8f0) for light mode. Avoid pure black or pure white.
visual.photography: Real humans in real contexts (commute, workout, meeting, coffee shop). Diverse, professional, 25-45 age range. Never staged-looking.

colors.warning: Never use red as a primary color — it signals danger. Orange (#f59e0b) for CTAs and urgency.
colors.gradient: Primary to secondary (indigo → cyan) for hero elements and CTAs

typography.headline: Bold sans-serif — Inter Black or SF Pro Display Heavy. All caps for short headlines (3 words max), title case for longer.
typography.subhead: Inter Semi-Bold, sentence case. 60-70% of headline size.
typography.body: Inter Regular, 14-16px equivalent. Line height 1.6. Left-aligned, never justified.
typography.cta: Inter Bold, ALL CAPS, letter-spacing +1px. Short (2-4 words): 'PRE-ORDER NOW', 'LEARN MORE', 'WATCH VIDEO'.
typography.price: Inter Black, larger than body. Always show '$199' prominently with strikethrough on '$279'.
rules: Never use serif fonts — they feel dated for AI/tech
Maximum 2 font weights per creative (e.g., Bold headline + Regular body)
Text must pass 4.5:1 contrast ratio (WCAG AA)
Minimum readable size: 12px equivalent on display ads
Headline text should be no more than 8 words

product_rendering.hero_shot: AirPod-style earbud in ear, close-up profile view. Subtle glow on the device suggesting AI processing. Clean, no clutter.
product_rendering.product_only: Single earbud on dark gradient background with soft shadow. Slight angle (15-20°). Light source from upper left.
product_rendering.lifestyle: Person wearing the AirPod AI in a natural setting — walking in city, at a standing desk, during a workout. Focus on the ear with background bokeh.
product_rendering.avoid: Never show the product floating in empty space. Never show wires/cables. Never show screens (this is screen-free by design).

headline_examples: YOUR AI. YOUR EAR. YOUR TERMS.
AI THAT GOES WHERE YOU GO
mandatory_elements: Stylized 'L' logo mark (do NOT spell out full brand name if logo is present)
forbidden: Never use unsupported superlatives (best, first-ever, revolutionary)

300x250.layout: Product hero top 60%, headline + CTA bottom 40%. Logo bottom-left corner.
300x250.text_limit: Headline (5 words max) + CTA. No body copy.

728x90.layout: Product left 30%, headline center 40%, CTA right 30%. Logo far-right.
728x90.text_limit: Headline (6 words max) + CTA. Horizontal flow.

160x600.layout: Logo top, product hero middle, headline below product, CTA bottom. Vertical stack.
160x600.text_limit: Headline (4 words max, stacked) + price + CTA.

1920x1080.layout: Cinematic widescreen. Product/person left third, headline + CTA right third. Bottom bar with logo + legal.
1920x1080.text_limit: Headline (8 words max) + subhead (1 line) + CTA + price.

prompt_suffix: Style: premium minimalist tech ad. Colors: deep navy/charcoal background with indigo (#6366f1) and cyan (#06b6d4) accents. Typography: bold clean sans-serif (Inter/SF Pro style), ALL CAPS headlines, high contrast white text. Product: sleek AirPod-style AI earbud with subtle glow. Include 'PRE-ORDER $199' CTA. Brand mark: stylized 'L' logo only (do NOT write out 'Locke AI Co.' — the L logo is sufficient). No clutter, no busy backgrounds, no serif fonts, no stock photo feel. 4.5:1 contrast ratio minimum.
